channel.title: CVE Feed for ASUS -- Download Master
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ASUS -- Download Master

item.title: CVE-2024-31159|2024-06-14T18:14:45.924Z -- asus -- download%20master
item.description: The parameter used in the certain page of ASUS Download Master is not properly filtered for user input. A remote attacker with administrative privilege can insert JavaScript code to the parameter for Reflected Cross-site scripting attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-31162|2024-06-14T06:35:07.192Z -- asus -- download%20master
item.description: The specific function parameter of ASUS Download Master does not properly filter user input. An unauthenticated remote attacker with administrative privileges can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary system commands on the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-31163|2024-06-14T06:52:50.331Z -- asus -- download%20master
item.description: ASUS Download Master has a buffer overflow vulnerability. An unauthenticated remote attacker with administrative privileges can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary system commands on the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-31159|2024-06-14T03:25:03.735Z -- asus -- download%20master
item.description: The parameter used in the certain page of ASUS Download Master is not properly filtered for user input. A remote attacker with administrative privilege can insert JavaScript code to the parameter for Reflected Cross-site scripting attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-31161|2024-06-14T03:53:51.560Z -- asus -- download%20master
item.description: The upload functionality of ASUS Download Master does not properly filter user input. Remote attackers with administrative privilege can exploit this vulnerability to upload any file to any location. They may even upload malicious web page files to the website directory, allowing arbitrary system commands to be executed upon browsing the webpage.

item.title: CVE-2024-31160|2024-06-14T03:41:21.402Z -- asus -- download%20master
item.description: The parameter used in the certain page of ASUS Download Master is not properly filtered for user input. A remote attacker with administrative privilege can insert JavaScript code to the parameter for Stored Cross-site scripting attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-31163|2024-06-14T15:41:17.475Z -- asus -- download%20master
item.description: ASUS Download Master has a buffer overflow vulnerability. An unauthenticated remote attacker with administrative privileges can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary system commands on the device.
